clinical_study.brief_title: Frequency of Hypoglycemia in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Under Insulin Therapy Older Than 75 Years in Real Life
clinical_study.official_title: Frequency of Hypoglycemia in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Under Insulin Therapy Older Than 75 Years in Real Life

brief_summary.textblock:
Diabetes is a chronic and progressive disease that affects nearly 3.5 million people in France.
Currently the investigators are seeing an aging of the population explained by the increase in life expectancy and thus an increasing incidence of diabetes in the elderly. However, the frequency of hypoglycemia in older vulnerable patients remains poorly characterized

primary_outcome.measure: Number of confirmed or severe hypoglycemia
primary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients with at least one episode of confirmed and / or severe hypoglycaemia by measuring capillary blood glucose during 4 weeks of prospective follow-up.

secondary_outcome.measure: number of events / patient / month of severe hypoglycemia
secondary_outcome.description: Number of confirmed severe hypoglycaemia episodes (events / patient / month), symptomatic or asymptomatic, occurring in patients during 4 weeks of prospective follow-up.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of hospitalizations due to hypoglycemia
secondary_outcome.description: Number and duration of hospital stays

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of asymptomatic confirmed (blood glucose value <0.70g / L) hypoglycemia
secondary_outcome.description: Confirmed asymptomatic hypoglycaemia (events / patient / month) occurring in patients collected with the FREESTYLE Libre glucose sensor

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of hypoglycaemia in elderly patients admitted to EHPAD
secondary_outcome.description: Confirmed hypoglycaemia (events / patient / month), symptomatic or asymptomatic, occurring in patients hospitalized in long-term geriatric care sector.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of confirmed nocturnal hypoglycaemia (occurring between 0h00-6h00)
secondary_outcome.description: Confirmed nocturnal hypoglycaemia (events / patient / month), symptomatic or asymptomatic, occurring in patients

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of confirmed hypoglycaemia with a threshold blood glucose value <0.54g / L (neuroglucopenic threshold)
secondary_outcome.description: Confirmed neuroglucopenic hypoglycaemia (events / patient / month), symptomatic or asymptomatic, occurring in patients

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of pseudo-hypoglycaemia and unconfirmed hypoglycaemia (Symptoms consistent with hypoglycemia, but with a blood glucose value ≥ 70 mg / dL)
secondary_outcome.description: Confirmed pseudo-hypoglycaemia and unconfirmed hypoglycaemia (events / patient / month), occurring in patients

secondary_outcome.measure: Score for fear of hypoglycemia in elderly diabetic patients
Number of confirmed and severe hypoglycaemia in patients with type 2 diabetes aged 75 years and older in "vigorous" and "vulnerable" subgroups of patients according to a geriatric assessment score
secondary_outcome.description: Confirmed hypoglycaemia (events / patient / month), symptomatic or asymptomatic, occurring in patients

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of the transition to ER due to hypoglycemia
secondary_outcome.description: Number and duration of emergency stays

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of falls due to hypoglycemia
secondary_outcome.description: Number of falls and loss of autonomy (no home support)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of death due to hypoglycemia
